column6: In the ultimate showdown with the Reavers, the New Mutants put their powers to the test and discover a potential new teammate.  But when the kids encounter a danger from within, will they band together to become a team or will they be overwhelmed by a power that is too dark and great to handle? 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.50
